attributes.additional_details: I think that the NLW & NMW for the different age groups are extremely poor. As an 18 year old I think it’s completely unjust that I can do the EXCACT same job as a 25 year old and get paid considerably less. My cost of living would be the same as that of an older person so why should my pay be different?
attributes.background: I want the government to set a standard wage for all ages. I think I can speak for the country when I say it is age discrimination and completely unfair.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Make the minimum wage equal for all
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600960
